questions.stem: What significant tariff change on Indian imports came into effect recently?
questions.explanation: The US doubled tariffs on Indian imports to 50%, citing geopolitical leverage and India’s oil purchases from Russia.

questions.stem: Which body did India establish to oversee carbon trading under the Paris Agreement?
questions.explanation: India set up a 21-member National Designated Authority led by the Union environment secretary to oversee carbon trading and related mechanisms.

questions.stem: In which multinational exercise is India deploying over 700 soldiers?
questions.explanation: India is sending over 700 soldiers to participate in Exercise Bright Star 2025, a key tri-service multilateral military drill in Egypt.

questions.stem: By 2030, what size is India’s bioeconomy projected to reach?
questions.explanation: According to the Press Information Bureau, India’s bioeconomy is expected to reach USD 300 billion by 2030.

questions.stem: What recent infrastructure disruption sparked citizen protests in Nagpur?
questions.explanation: A girder jam at Telephone Nagar Square due to flyover project works caused public outrage; NHAI assured action within 48 hours.

options.text: Girder jam at Telephone Nagar Square

questions.stem: Which international sporting event bid did India's cabinet approve?
questions.explanation: India’s federal cabinet approved its bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games, proposing a 132,000-seat stadium in Ahmedabad.

questions.stem: Which awards nominations are open until 30 September 2025?
questions.explanation: The National Youth Award 2024 nominations are open from 2 August to 30 September 2025.

questions.stem: Which scheme received ₹1,000 crore allocation for 2025-26?
questions.explanation: Under the budget for 2025-26, ₹1,000 crore is allocated to the Khelo India programme.

questions.stem: How did Indian stock markets react to the tariff news?
questions.explanation: Despite escalating tariffs, Indian markets remained stable, supported by forex reserves and central bank interventions.

questions.stem: Which rescue agency is involved in flood relief operations in Punjab?
questions.explanation: The Army and NDMA intensified flood relief in Punjab, evacuating thousands and providing rations and medical aid.

questions.stem: In response to the tariffs, which countries India strengthened ties with?
questions.explanation: Facing US tariffs, India reinforced diplomatic and trade ties with China and Russia.

questions.stem: Which breakthrough aids early detection of Parkinson’s disease?
questions.explanation: Tiny gold particles are being used as a detection tool for early Parkinson’s disease diagnosis.

questions.stem: Which region saw deadly cloudbursts, flash floods and landslides halting pilgrimage?
questions.explanation: Himalayan regions including Jammu & Kashmir (Vaishno Devi area) experienced deadly monsoon disasters, suspending Yatra routes.

questions.stem: What is the proposed capacity of the stadium in the 2030 CWG bid?
questions.explanation: The bid includes constructing a 132,000-seat stadium in Ahmedabad for the 2030 Commonwealth Games.

questions.stem: Which award nominations are open until mid-September 2025?
questions.explanation: The National Gopal Ratna Award 2025 has an open nominations window from 15 August to 15 September 2025.

questions.stem: What is the name of India’s flagship youth-sports development programme?
questions.explanation: The government programme aimed at promoting sports among youth is called Khelo India.

questions.stem: Which index slipped below 24,550 amid market pressure?
questions.explanation: The Nifty 50 dropped below 24,550 as the stock market traded lower on August 28, 2025.

questions.stem: Which tourist shrine’s yatra was halted due to landslides?
questions.explanation: Landslides near the Vaishno Devi shrine route in Jammu & Kashmir led to Yatra being paused for safety.

questions.stem: Which US leader’s administration increased tariffs on India?
questions.explanation: President Trump’s administration raised tariffs on Indian imports to 50%.

questions.stem: Which development helps in modelling stellar atmospheres?
questions.explanation: A recent scientific model provides new insight into stellar atmospheres, aiding astronomy research.
